subject: Smarter Ecommerce in 15 Minutes a Week ?
description_text:
Peak season is almost here — are your product pages, campaigns, and merchandising ready?

View in browser (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVzQCn1nl3NLW6R9qyy5Kj6SjW20x2Jc5Cjfd9N7lCd_j5jMY8W69t95C6lZ3l1W7TnH_z13_YnNW7msdTY3zNXmVN94kPwx1C86GW69Jymx17Q640W2M-s-j1cwkCWW442TCp4H5X0xW59HsC_5c17QfW8Gw53t5L7LNmW45Gp-v6WfswlW113Y6_2SP8XKW6YFy9R41PjW_N1Hnx03CY9gNW2ZRVHR4wsrZvW3d22tq1W-M8_W3TJRsx1MJ4wrVJR6Y235H-xsVl_M_C48tbD-W2kwqDR4QWbD1W5CSTHn1Lp3xmV56zKR1hZRB4VM4pM_8cgxW5W46C8fM2CYr54W13cxYh22ZS8QW79k5K11J9KMYW5lLQrK2WrZNcW2QDl8d4ffqqgW6DNMR71xBZ_-W4Jv1Md9b5bxYW3Qc3Xv9gnqL_W1KM_F475yCFcW6lQhrB6_vY7JW6NkVcW3jpJr4W11PXG-1Fy1q3N5NxkLNGl8FHW5lCMYt8-ylwQW4qhqww4XqrtTf6j8Rwz04 )

Hey Atto,

Peak season is almost here — are your product pages, campaigns, and merchandising ready?

We’re kicking off a 4-part rapid-fire webinar series designed to help ecommerce professionals like you test, track, and optimise for maximum BFCM success. Each 15-minute session is short, actionable, and led by Athos Commerce specialists who’ve been in your shoes.

Here’s the line-up (and how to register):

? Sept 18, 10am AEST – How to Test Your Product Content Before You Launch

? Run split tests on titles, images, and descriptions to launch with confidence.

? Register for Sept 18 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVzQCn1nl3NLW6R9qyy5Kj6SjW20x2Jc5Cjfd9N7lCf0b3lcq-W7Y8-PT6lZ3lxV9kVKw5CqyLCW2Cnr0P8G44m6W8hJYKT8MVtFQW1H3kpF46KVTwW4knMwJ3Q1zj0N3Ywt_6_JQkVW6gb6Fq970RJxW79q6TN2mD1z_VljkZb8FfDN9N2Zz2-N3tzjXW1vqhhW7jfnL2W8Vb8Nr21h6n3W3tqZLl1PmSVVW3P5nKd3Z8CLsW5JThxl4jR22QW5kX6kX3qtWbVV5s-cj8KFxJCVpqDnD63TPRZW2S72lX1sQZ3dW8zXN1r5S1ScVW5Xw6hx7Cl507W3RcxH06qvDMKN5r4vxHTcWFDW6N_y-t1Hjsb4W6p0Dg08DPQHVW8Vf1N67sRlWbf45-p5g04 )

? Sept 25, 10am AEST  – How to Track Full-Funnel Ecommerce Performance in 15 Mins

? From impressions to conversions — connect the dots across platforms.

? Register for Sept 25 (https://d56STN04.na1.hubspotlinks.com/Ctc/UD+113/d56STN04/VVzQCn1nl3NLW6R9qyy5Kj6SjW20x2Jc5Cjfd9N7lCf0b3lcq-W7Y8-PT6lZ3pMN1XwNnJz81Z4W6D3KKL3ynsMpW3vTsNR39YfxCW1dz9j-5bxPMrVRmRQw6P_w_QW5pLVYD90llxkVJ1XPW7CzhzXW4gHfG77Yl3QMW2zhF5v5f4nFPW6S47kh14nzKCW2MLZXV44kNx_W3qb8jr2wN8ntW6Pkwfg96jyBsW3hrwqT5tThGwN45Tx1j7j5_8V_04rv5s6mL8N2ptyLVhkZXYW8zFZXT69-cd3MtqMT7TyC5wMvgCmxFBQGSW3dS8n_401K3NW1dXxGr8qby1NW7MY5Pf4vTtcfW722nsm7Ys7t5W6w70311-Jnj-W2N34Hs2nTpghf1CkBCR04 )

? Discover smarter merchandising rules that automatically adapt to your goals.

?
